state_description: This screen prompts the user to quit certain applications to proceed with maintenance tasks. It lists applications that need to be closed to clean related items effectively.

enables.name: Quit Mail
enables.description: Closes the Mail application to proceed with cleaning related items.

enables.name: Ignore
enables.description: Ignores the prompt and continues without quitting the listed applications.

enables.name: Quit All
enables.description: Closes all listed applications to proceed with cleaning related items.
